description: This file defines a Pydantic model for pagination parameters used in API list endpoints, including limit and offset fields with validation and descriptions.

classes.name: PaginationParams
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing pagination parameters with limit and offset fields, including validation constraints.

methods.name: PaginationParams.__init__
methods.description: Constructor for PaginationParams, automatically generated by Pydantic based on class annotations.

ctags.name: limit
ctags.pattern: /^    limit: int = Field(default=50, ge=1, le=500, description="Maximum number of items to return./

ctags.name: offset
ctags.pattern: /^    offset: int = Field(default=0, ge=0, description="Number of items to skip before returning r/
